author: Reuters
title: Gold falls 1% on hopes of slowing virus spread
description: The metal had risen as much as 2.8 per cent on Monday.
content:
Gold prices fell 1 per cent on Tuesday, retreating from a one-month high hit earlier in the session as risk sentiment improved on wider market optimism that the coronavirus pandemic may be easing.
Spot gold was down 0.3 per cent at $1,657.50 per ounce by 085… [+2316 chars]
